cards.name: Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana
cards.text:
[ACT](VC)1/Turn:COST [Discard a card from your hand], choose a grade 0 card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, COST [Counter Blast (1)], and this unit and all of your units with the [overDress] ability get [Power]+10000 until end of turn.

cards.name: Blaze Maiden, Reiyu
cards.text:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana", COST [Soul Blast (1)], search your deck for up to one "Vairina", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power]+2000.

cards.name: Blaze Maiden, Rino
cards.text:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Blaze Maiden, Reiyu", search your deck for up to one "Trickstar", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power]+2000.

cards.name: Sunrise Egg
cards.text: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

cards.name: Fire Slash Dragon, Inferno Sword
cards.text: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power]+2000.

cards.name: Vairina
cards.text:
[overDress] - "Trickstar" (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC))
[AUTO](RC):When this unit in the [overDress] state attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power]+10000 until end of that battle. Then, COST [Soul Blast (2)], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

cards.name: Escort Stealth Dragon, Hayashi Kaze
cards.text:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), COST [discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.

cards.name: Trickstar
cards.text: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.

cards.name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
cards.text:
(You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)
Additional Effect-Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+100 Million until end of turn!

cards.name: Blaze Maiden, Zonne
cards.text: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical]+1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+10000 until end of turn!)

cards.name: Blaze Staff Monk, Cho Kuu Sha
cards.text: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+10000 until end of turn!)

cards.name: Blaze Fist Monk, Nikko
cards.text: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power]+10000 until end of turn!)

cards.name: Blaze Maiden, Rona
cards.text: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)

cards.name: Sunburst Evolution
cards.text:
Play this with COST [Counter Blast (1)]!
Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn. Choose a "Vairina" from your drop, and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Aurora Battle Princess, Seraph Snow
cards.text:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if one or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power]+10000, and if three or more cards are imprisoned, this unit gets drive +1.
[ACT](VC/RC)1/Turn:COST [Counter Blast (1)], choose two of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison them in your Prison. (Put them into your Order Zone that has a Prison)

cards.name: Aurora Battle Princess, Risatt Pink
cards.text:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and imprisons it in your Prison. (Put it into your Order Zone that has a Prison)
[CONT](RC):If one or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power]+2000.

cards.name: Aurora Battle Princess, Kyanite Blue
cards.text:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), search your deck for up to one Prison card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if one or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, COST [Counter Blast (1) & Soul Blast (1)], and draw a card.

cards.name: Aurora Battle Princess, Ruby Red
cards.text: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

cards.name: Alert Guard Gunner
cards.text: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose up to two of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison them in your Prison. (Put them into your Order Zone that has a Prison)

cards.name: Security Patroller
cards.text: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), COST [Soul Blast (1)], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison it in your Prison. (Put it into your Order Zone that has a Prison)

cards.name: Autonomic Caution
cards.text: [CONT](RC/GC):If one or more of your opponent's cards is imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power]+2000/[Shield]+5000.

cards.name: Craggy Monster, Girgrand
cards.text:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), COST [discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.

cards.name: Aurora Battle Princess, Lourus Yellow
cards.text: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical]+1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+10000 until end of turn.)

cards.name: Aurora Battle Princess, Amy Orange
cards.text: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+10000 until end of turn!)

cards.name: Aurora Battle Princess, Fronte Rose
cards.text: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power]+10000 until end of turn!)

cards.name: Aurora Battle Princess, Treuse Green
cards.text: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)

cards.name: Galaxy Central Prison, Galactolus
cards.text:
(After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)
COST [[Rest] one of your units] to play this card!
[AUTO]:When this card is put into the Order Zone, Soul Charge (3).
[CONT](Order Zone):When your opponent can normal call a rear-guard, they can perform the following:
• Soul Blast (1). If they do so, they choose one of their imprisoned cards, and call it to (RC).
• Counter Blast (1). If they do so, they choose two of their imprisoned cards, and call them to (RC).
